On Mon, Nov 2, 2020 at 1:42 PM Dawn Hughes wrote: 
Great. We will speak then. I have attached my CV and standard engagement agreement for your 
review. 
On 
Mon, Nov 2, 2020 at 1:37 PM 
Dr. Hughes, 
wrote: 
Thanks very m on Wednesday, and if that works for you we can use this 
conference line 
Thanks, 
EFTA00030529

Sent from my iPhone 
On Nov 2, 2020, at 10:54 AM, Dawn Hughes 
rote: 
Yes. I would be happy to speak with you all. I have some open time on Wednesday after 2:00. 
Let me know what works for you. 
Best, 
Dr. 
Hughes 
DAWN M HUGHES, PHD ABPP 
CLINICAL AND FORENSIC PSYCHOLOGIST 
On Thu, Oct 29, 2020 at 3:48 PM 
wrote: 
Dr. 
Hughes, 
Together with colleagues I'm one of the federal prosecutors 
handling the case of United States v.  Ghislaine Maxwell, which is scheduled to go to trial on July 12, 
2021 in the Southern District of New York. We would be interested in speaking with you about your 
availability to testify as an expert witness at trial. Are you available for a call tomorrow or next week to 
discuss? 
Thanks
EFTA00030530
